_source.short_desc: Pointerpro is a software platform that allows you to create online training assessments that generate personalized reports.
_source.long_desc: Pointerpro is a software platform that allows you to create online training assessments that automatically generate personalized reports. Discover why many consultants and companies like Capgemini, EDF, and Bare International automate the delivery of personalized advice with Pointerpro. Whether the goal is to scale your business, generate leads, or save time through automation, Pointerpro makes things easier for you. Start your 7-day free trial now!
_source.pricing_details:
Basic plan: FREE, 20 responses/month
Essential plan: $39/month, 400 responses/month - $399 Annually
Professional plan: $59/month 2000 responses/month - $599 Annually
Enterprise plan: On request, 5000+ responses/month, multi-user
ReportR plan: On request
_source.target_audience: Discover why many consultants and companies like Capgemini, EDF, and Bare International automate the delivery of personalized advice with Pointerpro.

category_features.name: Academic/Education
category_features.definition: Software specialized for schools (K-12 & Post-Secondary)

category_features.name: Asynchronous Learning
category_features.definition: Learning sessions in which a group of learners are participating and engaging in learning at different times

category_features.name: Blended Learning
category_features.definition: Courses or paths that combine in person classes with virtual online classes

category_features.name: Built-in Course Authoring
category_features.definition: Tools that allow you to create and publish courses and course material/content

category_features.name: Built-in LMS
category_features.definition: LMS functionality built-in for content delivery

category_features.name: Certification & Licensing
category_features.definition: Track and ensure employees obtain necessary skill sets/certifications

category_features.name: Corporate/Business
category_features.definition: Software specialized for corporate training

category_features.name: Course Management
category_features.definition: Create a course, organize it and assign it to learners

category_features.name: Learner Portal
category_features.definition: Students can access materials and communicate with instructors via their online student profile

category_features.name: Mobile Learning
category_features.definition: Access for students to complete learning materials on mobile platforms

category_features.name: Modeling & Simulation
category_features.definition: Hands-on, interactive training method

category_features.name: Synchronous Learning
category_features.definition: Learning sessions in which a group of learners are participating and engaging in learning at the same time

category_features.name: Training Administration
category_features.definition: Back-office tasks (ie. schedule courses, organize resources, course registrations, and email reminders)

category_features.name: Training Companies
category_features.definition: Software designed for companies who offer training programs to clients

category_features.name: eCommerce Management
category_features.definition: Sell products online

related_products.short_desc: Free online learning management system, providing educators around the world with an open source solution for e-learning.
related_products.features: Moodle is the world's most trusted online learning solution. The engine of the Moodle ecosystem is Moodle LMS, the secure and customisable open-source platform used by over 250 million learners worldwide. Developed in conjunction with its loyal community, Moodle LMS is complemented by an ecosystem of products including Moodle Workplace and a network of partners and services providing hosting, customisations and support.

related_products.short_desc: Train employees, partners and customers effectively with a next-gen LMS that delivers a personalized learning experience at scale.
related_products.features: Train employees, partners and customers effectively with a next-gen LMS. Deliver hybrid learning programs, manage classroom sessions, and drive self-paced training with ease. Use the power of Artificial Intelligence to drive relevant content recommendations, create seamless learning experiences with the format-agnostic Fluidic Player, engage with gamification & social learning, and automate reporting. Adobe's LMS is recognized by leading industry bodies and awarded for stellar performance

related_products.short_desc: WebHR is everyone's favorite and a global leader in Cloud HR - Helps you manage the most important asset in your company - your People!
related_products.features: WebHR is revolutionizing the way HR works. WebHR is a Social all-in-one Cloud based HR Software for Small & Medium Enterprises that handles everything from Hire to Retire, in the most innovate way. WebHR not only saves money to the companies, but also boosts productivity, saves space and make inter and intra-office communications fast, reliable and more efficient. WebHR assists in managing a companys most important asset - its People.

related_products.short_desc: Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, TalentLMS helps companies reach their employee, partner, and customer training goals.
related_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it's where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams embrace training while feeling right at home. TalentLMS makes it easy to provide the right training to any team and every use, while giving expert guidance and support every step of the way. On a mission to democratize training, TalentLMS already serves 70, 000+ teams worldwide.

related_products.short_desc: Built for learning, our fully redesigned web conferencing solution allows employees to fulfill training requirements anywhere, anytime.
related_products.features: Focused on education and training, Blackboard Collaborate is designed for simplicity, accessibility and to support education and training workflows. Whether it's an online meeting, virtual group training, or connecting remote employees, our one-click virtual training solution offers a level of connection and engagement that makes learners forget that they're not in a physical space.

related_products.short_desc: Through our innovative technology and services, Blackboard helps organizations turn learning into a strategic advantage.
related_products.features: Blackboard is the largest learning company in the world. With over 100 million learners and 20 years of experience, we've perfected the art of effective learning. We've helped over 700 corporate and government organizations around the world deliver outcomes-based learning that drives employee growth in a measurable way. Our unified learning ecosystem of both technology and services provides a trusted one-stop solution that powers learning programs that make employees and organizations thrive.

related_products.short_desc: The all-in-one knowledge and training app that makes it easy to train and grow your team. Get your business out of your brain today.
related_products.features: Trainual is a knowledge transfer and training platform where growing teams build the playbook for how they do what they do. With Trainual, every process, policy, and procedure for all the roles and responsibilities in your business are easily documented, organized, assignable, and searchable. The result is faster onboarding and training, more seamless delegation, consistent processes as you scale, increased accountability, and everybody stays in-the-know with your need-to-knows.

related_products.short_desc: Compliance & CE is a complete learning management solution for your laboratory.
related_products.features: Compliance & CE is a complete learning solution for your laboratory. Provide safety training, P.A.C.E.-approved continuing education, and custom courses and checklists to your employees in one cost-effective online system.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify your training today with our award-winning learning management system and 1200+ professionally created training courses.
related_products.features: SAP Litmos Training offers an award-winning learning management system and 1200+ professionally created, SME-tested, video-based courses designed to fuel or supplement your training programs. With a wide range of topics-from diversity awareness and compliance to sales mastery or cyber security-you're covered in keeping your organization informed with the most current knowledge.

related_products.short_desc: 360Learning is the LMS for collaborative learning. We help companies upskill from within by turning internal SMEs into growth drivers.
related_products.features: Your employees have valuable knowledge, and you need to tap into it. Now, you can. 360Learning enables companies to upskill from within by turning their experts into champions for employee, customer, and partner growth. With our LMS for collaborative learning, L&D teams can accelerate upskilling with the help of internal experts instead of top-down training. 360Learning is the easiest way to onboard and upskill employees, train customer-facing teams, and enable customers-all from one place.

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one system of learning that brings together learning, growth, skills, and capabilities into a personalized, curated experience.
related_products.features: Cornerstone Learning helps you provide a connected learning and growth experience for your people. Create a personalized development and growth experience that inspires people and accelerates transformation. Get a solution designed to dynamically understand your users, connect them to personalized opportunities for growth and help them develop the skills that will get them here to there.

similar_products.short_desc: Udemy Business helps companies stay competitive in today's rapidly changing workplace by offering fresh, on-demand learning content.
similar_products.features: Udemy Business helps companies achieve critical business outcomes and stay competitive by offering engaging on-demand, immersive, and cohort-based learning. With our integrated learning solutions and strategic partnership, we equip companies with the tools to build a future-ready workforce, increase employee engagement, and achieve business outcomes.

similar_products.short_desc: Engaging 23.5 million learners, Absorb LMS has the intuitive interface, agile features and 24/7 support to empower your organization.
similar_products.features: Absorb LMS empowers businesses across the globe to surpass learning goals. Built to deliver flexible training, the intuitive design and robust features create an engaging learning environment that keeps your employees, customers and partners coming back for more. Serving customers in 120 industry verticals, Absorb LMS offers automation and deep reporting capabilities to save time and prove ROI. Tap the scalable LMS that supports integration and security, while offering 24/7 in-house support.

similar_products.short_desc: All-in-one system of learning that brings together learning, growth, skills, and capabilities into a personalized, curated experience.
similar_products.features: Cornerstone Learning helps you provide a connected learning and growth experience for your people. Create a personalized development and growth experience that inspires people and accelerates transformation. Get a solution designed to dynamically understand your users, connect them to personalized opportunities for growth and help them develop the skills that will get them here to there.

similar_products.short_desc: Tovuti is an all-in-one eLearning platform that empowers companies of all kinds to activate the potential of their organization.
similar_products.features: Tovuti's all-in-one cloud-based learning management system (LMS) gives you all the tools you need to create, deliver, and track the effectiveness of your eLearning programs. Create engaging interactive courses in minutes using Tovuti's interactive modules and our easy to use course creation suite. Build as many courses and lessons as you need. Give learners a personal dashboard with everything relevant to their learning experiences such as courses, checklists, badges, certificates, and more!

similar_products.short_desc: HSI is the leader in safety training, workforce development content, and compliance solutions. Try today!
similar_products.features:
HSI is the leader in safety training, workforce development content, and compliance solutions. 

Our combination of technology and content solutions helps Safety, HR, and Operations leaders train and develop their workforce, keep workers safe and meet regulatory and operational compliance requirements. 

From safety training and management and compliance, HSI has solutions for businesses of all sizes, across all industry types.

similar_products.short_desc: An award winning game-based assessment tool that measures soft skills in prospective & existing employee's in a fun & engaging process.
similar_products.features:
Owiwi is a fun and engaging psychometric tool that accurately measures prospective and existing employee's soft skills. Think of a combination of advanced scientific methodology packed within an immersive game that candidates enjoy taking part in. 

We take away the stress in the hiring process for the candidate while eliminating the recruiter risk of hiring the wrong candidate by offering data-driven and bias-free insights and accelerating the screening/shortlisting process with automations.

similar_products.short_desc: Kaltura is the first-in-class video-based training solution for your remote L&D program, from onboarding to reskilling and upskilling.
similar_products.features: Kaltura Training Platform is the first-in-class video-based training solution for all your remote Learning & Development needs, from onboarding to reskilling and upskilling. Boost employee learning and development with branded video experiences. Instill company culture, foster employee well-being, and reduce employee turnover with Kaltura's training and company events solution.

similar_products.short_desc: EHS Insight has everything you need to manage competency and training, including training requests, records, certifications and more.
similar_products.features: EHS Insight has everything you need to manage competency and training, including training requests, records, certifications, licenses, skills-assessments, surveys, course content and more. With a fresh, user-friendly interface and everything you need to automate and improve your Training Management Program, it will be the must-have application of 2022. Trust the industry leader first with offline access, first with a full-suite mobile application and first in the cloud.

similar_products.short_desc: With L&D powered by BizLibrary, employees are equipped with the skills for the job today and ready to take on new challenges tomorrow.
similar_products.features: At BizLibrary, we're on a mission to elevate employees' skills, create better places to work and do our part to build a more compassionate and competent future. We lean into these goals every day by supporting organizations' learning and development needs through our innovative platforms, best-in-class content, and unrivaled strategic support. With L&D powered by BizLibrary, employees are equipped with the skills they need for the job today and ready to take on new challenges tomorrow.

similar_products.features: TalentLMS is the LMS built for training success. Designed to get a "yes" from everyone, it's where great teams, and companies, go to grow. With an experience that's fully customizable and easy to manage, teams embrace training while feeling right at home. TalentLMS makes it easy to provide the right training to any team and every use, while giving expert guidance and support every step of the way. On a mission to democratize training, TalentLMS already serves 70, 000+ teams worldwide.

similar_products.short_desc: Easily create flexible online employee training and get real-time insights with Connecteam's training software.
similar_products.features: Connecteam's training software is a simple and easy tool to bring your employees up to speed. Suitable for any industry and company size. Easily create custom online training and onboarding courses. Add quizzes, files, media, and links. Track and evaluate performance in real-time. Create flexibility. Enable employees to complete training from mobile or desktop. Monitor and optimize your training process. Boost employee engagement. Streamline course structure and reduce overhead costs and effort.

similar_products.short_desc: We are the best platform for entrepreneurs to easily create online courses and memberships to produce time freedom and revenue.
similar_products.features:
We are the anti-all-in-one online course and membership software.
Online business owners, experts, coaches and trainers easily create online courses and membership sites to produce time freedom & new revenue streams.

?Easy to learn and use.

?No need to move away from the software you love because we deeply integrate with what you own.

?Businesses that offer all-in-one lose sight of what you need. CustomerHub is best for you to create, deliver, and automate your online courses and memberships.

similar_products.features: Trainual is a knowledge transfer and training platform where growing teams build the playbook for how they do what they do. With Trainual, every process, policy, and procedure for all the roles and responsibilities in your business are easily documented, organized, assignable, and searchable. The result is faster onboarding and training, more seamless delegation, consistent processes as you scale, increased accountability, and everybody stays in-the-know with your need-to-knows.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Course Authoring software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Course Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Course authoring software enables organizations to develop customized training courses for educating employees, or for teachers to develop courses for their students. Course content can often be imported from multiple applications, and presented in different media formats. Once developed, courses can be published through a Learning Management System (LMS) or Training software, or as stand alone computer / web based training.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top eLearning Authoring tools on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of eLearning Authoring tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: eLearning Authoring Tools are used to create engaging, interactive educational content delivered through digital media and electronic devices.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Human Resource software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Human Resource tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Human Resource software, also known as a Human Resources Information System (HRIS) or Human Resources Management System (HRMS), enables an organization to manage employee records and information. Human Resource Management software allows you to organize contact details, department, attendance, salary, training, benefits and more. Many Human Resource Management systems and resource management software also interface with applicant tracking and payroll software. Human Resource Management software is related to Applicant Tracking software, Payroll software, Performance Appraisal software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Experience Platform software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Experience Platform tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Experience Platforms (LEP) allow organizations to consolidate diverse training resources into a single place and provide personalized learning paths and experiences for each trainee.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Learning Management Systems (LMS) on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Learning Management Systems (LMS) and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Learning Management Systems (LMS) provide a framework through which learning content is delivered and managed. An LMS allows for an anytime, anywhere learning environment, delivering and tracking eLearning courses and testing. A Learning Content Management System (LCMS) enables the organization to learn content from Courseware authoring tools and presentation of the content to students. Learning Management Systems are related to Training software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Virtual Reality (VR) software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of VR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: VR, or Virtual Reality, software is used to create immersive 3D environments that could be used for training or product prototyping. Additionally, immercive and interctive VR environments are often used in entertainment industry.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workforce Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workforce Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workforce Management software enables organizations to plan, track, and manage the allocation and requirements of labor resources. Workforce Management solutions also help organizations develop and retain top talent. These applications allow businesses to optimize staff scheduling, while reducing labor costs. Workforce Management software is related to Human Resource software, Payroll software, Scheduling software and Time Clock software.

category_features.name: Data Analysis Tools
category_features.definition: Analyze survey results via statistical testing or crosstabs directly within the software

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Mobile Survey
category_features.definition: Distribute a survey via mobile devices

category_features.name: Offline Response Collection
category_features.definition: Allow participants to fill out and submit the survey without internet connection

category_features.name: Question Branching
category_features.definition: Show participants specific questions based on their answer to a previous question (ie. different paths)

category_features.name: Question Library
category_features.definition: Prepopulate common question/answer options

category_features.name: Site Intercept Survey
category_features.definition: Survey popup over a webpage to specific users based on their behavior

category_features.name: Skip Logic
category_features.definition: Avoid showing participants irrelevant questions as determined by the answer to a previous question

category_features.name: Support Audio/Images/Video
category_features.definition: Allow media to be embedded in the question or answer options

category_features.name: URL Customization
category_features.definition: Change the URL of your survey to fit your branding or survey title

category_features.name: Multi-User Collaboration
category_features.definition: Two-way actions and data sharing between several users in real time

category_features.name: Scoring
category_features.definition: Automatically calculate score after the assessment

category_features.name: Test/Quiz Creation
category_features.definition: Create or build customized tests and quizzes

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Archiving & Retention
category_features.definition: Process of moving and separately storing data that is not actively used or continuous storage of data for compliance purposes

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Ability to work collectively on a project while communicating and sharing information within the system in real time

category_features.name: Drag & Drop
category_features.definition: Click and object and drag and drop through an interface

category_features.name: Forms Creation & Design
category_features.definition: Create and design new forms from scratch using templates and design tools, or scan and convert existing forms into the system

category_features.name: Full Text Search
category_features.definition: Look through entire documents, not just sections

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflow

category_features.name: Version Control
category_features.definition: Track revisions and updates to collateral, and navigate between versions of the same documentation

category_features.name: Business Card/Badge Scanning
category_features.definition: Capture contact information by scanning a physical item and having the system automatically extract data from the scan

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Data Extraction
category_features.definition: Automatically extract information from documents or websites and input it into a database in a specified format

category_features.name: Lead Distribution
category_features.definition: Route and distribute your leads to third party buyers

category_features.name: Lead Notifications
category_features.definition: Receive an alert when new lead comes in

category_features.name: Lead Nurturing
category_features.definition: Develop relationships with potential buyers throughout their buying journey by providing helpful information along the way

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Identify which leads fit your target audience and are most likely to become customers

category_features.name: Online Forms
category_features.definition: Create new forms or from templates to help with creation of transactional content

category_features.name: 360 Degree Feedback
category_features.definition: A process in which an employee receives feedback and a full analysis of how their peers, managers, and direct reports perceive them.

category_features.name: Compensation Management
category_features.definition: Organize and track payroll, bonuses, and additional company benefits and perks distributed to each employee

category_features.name: Customizable Templates
category_features.definition: Create, save, and re-purpose formatting

category_features.name: Customization
category_features.definition: Customize the levels of performance/achievement (i.e. numeric or alphabetic)

category_features.name: Individual Development Plans
category_features.definition: Document completed by employee to assist with career and personal development to reach short term and long term goals

category_features.name: On-going Performance Tracking
category_features.definition: Organize real time feedback and assessments on employees' skills and accomplishments to determine promotions or performance plans

category_features.name: Peer Appraisals
category_features.definition: Peer/teammate feedback and review on individual's performance

category_features.name: Review Cycle Tracking
category_features.definition: Follow the progression of a task associated with performance reviews

category_features.name: Self Assessment
category_features.definition: An individual's evaluation of his or her own strengths, weaknesses, and skills

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Skills Assessment
category_features.definition: Observe employees over a period of time to gain an understanding of their abilities to perform certain tasks

category_features.name: Weighted Performance Measures
category_features.definition: Assess skills, outcomes and results using preset metrics and averages

category_features.name: Customizable Dashboard
category_features.definition: Alter the layout and content of dashboards

category_features.name: Data Connectors
category_features.definition: Connect to big data sources

category_features.name: Data Import/Export
category_features.definition: Export reports and associated data into Excel

category_features.name: Drag & Drop
category_features.definition: Click and object and drag and drop through an interface

category_features.name: Financial Reporting
category_features.definition: Generate statements to gauge performance and financial position (ie. income statement, balance sheet)

category_features.name: Forecasting
category_features.definition: Form predictions based on past and present data/trends

category_features.name: Marketing Reports
category_features.definition: Reports specific to marketing and associated campaigns

category_features.name: OLAP
category_features.definition: Online Analytical Processing, analyze different dimensions for data discovery (complex calculations, what ifs, etc)

category_features.name: Sales Reports
category_features.definition: Reports specific to sales analysis for trends and strategies

category_features.name: Scheduled / Automated Reports
category_features.definition: Set a time to generate routine reports automatically

category_features.name: Search/Filter
category_features.definition: View different and/or more detailed information within a certain data set

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
related_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

related_products.short_desc: Motivosity is an employee engagement platform that helps people be more motivated at work.
related_products.features: Motivosity is a modern employee engagement software with the mission to make people happier at work. Our platform focuses on three of the top drivers of employee satisfaction: feeling appreciated for your work, being part of a community, and having a meaningful relationship with your manager. With an average 95% user engagement rate, our software drives amazing results by making consistent recognition a part of your culture and making visible all the great work your team members are doing.

related_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
related_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

related_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
related_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

related_products.short_desc: Create engaging, platform-independent and beautiful surveys. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to collect feedback.
related_products.features:
SurveyLegend is the next generation of online surveys engaging, platform-independent & beautiful. We empower companies - large & small - & individuals, to create mobile-friendly, gorgeous surveys.

Now you can create great-looking surveys on your PC or tablet, customize the look of your survey however you like, & display collected data with eye-catching & insightful graphics. Creating questionnaires is done simply by drag & drop, & you don't need to be a market research expert to use our tool.

related_products.short_desc: Collect more useful feedback with surveys that look and feel great. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps.
related_products.features: Get more insights and useful feedback using Typeform: over 1.5 million typeforms are submitted every single day. Why? Our forms look amazing (and are fully customizable to your brand), plus the smooth and responsive UI makes filling them in a pleasure. 120+ integrations to your favorite apps lets you send data automatically wherever you need it. Plus, it's quick and simple to make a typeform: get started with our easy form builder, and launch your survey in minutes.

related_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
related_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

related_products.short_desc: Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar!
related_products.features:
Bring the voice of the customer to your decision-making with on-site and external Surveys from Hotjar.
Hotjar Surveys allow you to ask your site visitors an unlimited number of questions, from an unlimited number of respondents. On-site surveys appear as pop-up widgets on your webpage(s), and external link surveys appear as stand-alone pages with their own designated web address (URL). Use our pre-built templates or create your own.

related_products.short_desc: Online survey tool that lets you create unlimited surveys, distribute them and analyze the data  with ease.
related_products.features:
Zoho Survey is easy-to-use online survey and questionnaire building software. Our features are scalable to suit yourneeds, with everything essential to create surveys, distribute them, and analyze responses.Survey panels are also available, if you needdata from specific demographics.
Informed decisions are just around the corner.Learn more about Zoho Survey at https://www.zoho.com/survey/.

similar_products.short_desc: WorkTango enables companies to give their employees a voice and easily collect feedback for any purpose to support actionable insight.
similar_products.features:
The WorkTango platform creates a space for employees to have a voice and helps companies easily gather frequent feedback for any engagement, transformation, or feedback initiative. 

Using data science and natural language understanding, actionable insights from employee feedback are served in real-time to Human Resources, C-Suite executives, and people leaders. 

The results are quicker insight, better people actionable decisions, and a more aligned and engaged workforce.

similar_products.short_desc: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey software and no per-response fees.
similar_products.features: Alchemer Survey Software gives everyone in your organization powerful, easy-to-use survey and customer feedback software that's flexible enough for each team to use it their way, while still giving IT full security control and insight. Alchemer won Fastest Implementation, Easiest Setup, and Best Meets Requirements from users at G2.com. Get the feedback you need with the most question types and no per-response fees.

similar_products.short_desc: An experience management platform for organizations of all sizes that seamlessly automates data collection and analysis.
similar_products.features: Experience management platform by Sogolytics seamlessly automates data collection and analysis for organizations of all sizes. From designing and distributing a questionnaire to analysis and closing the loop, the platform does everything with ease and at a level of sophistication that is rare in the industry. Sogolytics is differentiated by its best-in-class, 24/7 customer support, deep analytics, industry-leading data security, and its ability to scale with organizations' growing needs.

similar_products.short_desc: A market-leading survey platform.
similar_products.features: Trusted by 98% of the Fortune 500 and used in more than 335,000 organizations worldwide, SurveyMonkey's platform gives millions of people a way to turn feedback into action that drives growth and innovation. Get access to expert-written survey templates that speak to customers, employees, or your target audience. Create simple to advanced surveys in minutes. Discover why SurveyMonkey is a leading survey platform around the globe!

similar_products.short_desc: Birdeye Surveys is an easy-to-use product that turns customer feedback into revenue and is part of the Experience Marketing platform.
similar_products.features:
Birdeye Surveys gives you an easy-to-use Survey Builder to build out surveys with advanced skip logic to
survey your customers, prospects, and employees. Survey Automation allows you to send out automated
survey requests, and ask for reviews [and referrals roadmap Q2] along with your survey. Set up email alerts
to notify specific locations/employees when survey responses come in. Survey Insights analyzes customer
feedback at scale using Athena, a Natural Language Processing engine.

similar_products.short_desc: Get valuable feedback or conduct research online with Jotform's customizable, mobile-friendly surveys, questionnaires, and polls.
similar_products.features: Whether you need to conduct market research or obtain valuable feedback for your business, Jotform makes it easier than ever to create powerful online surveys that get answers fast. Build engaging and easy-to-fill surveys, questionnaires, polls, and more without any coding. Save responses in a collaborative spreadsheet-powered database platform, or turn them into visual reports in just one click to better analyze and present results.

similar_products.short_desc: GetFeedback is the #1-rated feedback solution for Salesforce. Seamlessly connect all of your CX surveys for actionable insight.
similar_products.features: With GetFeedback for Salesforce, you can automatically collect customer feedback at critical touchpoints in the customer journey. Pull more context into your surveys then push feedback into Salesforce so you can measure valuable customer metrics like NPS, CSAT, or CES and take intelligent action to improve your customer experience. GetFeedback customers see a 240% increase in response rates and 7x faster implementation than other cx survey platforms.

similar_products.short_desc: Tremendous is the best platform to offer rewards and incentives to survey participants.
similar_products.features: Tremendous is the ultimate platform to maximize survey participation at a global scale. Incentivize survey takers with instant digital rewards, including gift cards, prepaid Visa? cards, cash and more. Buy, track and manage survey incentives individually and in bulk via the Tremendous platform, or automatically by integrating with our API.

similar_products.short_desc: Coach, motivate, and empower your employees to make every customer experience awesome.
similar_products.features:
Get more repeat purchases and referrals by improving your customers' experiences. Collect real-time customer feedback to motivate, engage, and coach your service providers so they can deliver exceptional customer experiences, every time. 

Discover why AskNicely is the leading Customer Experience Management solution. Learn more at asknicely.com.

similar_products.short_desc: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile AI-powered platform to reshape your customer experience.
similar_products.features: Momentive combines people-centric solutions with an agile, AI-powered platform to give every decision-maker in your organization the power to reshape your customer experience, your product, or your industry. Leveraging 20 plus years of expertise and over 55 billion responses by 6 billion respondents, Momentive is powered by real human inputs, based on proven best practices and delivers exceptional user experience. Trusted by over 98% of Fortune 500 companies.

similar_products.short_desc: HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance.
similar_products.features:
HappyOrNot is a customer feedback insights solution that helps companies improve operational excellence and business performance, instantly and over time.

Our range of easy-to-use feedback-collecting Smileys, analytics, and reporting helps companies make informed decisions based on real-time, continuous data. Know how you're doing, what works (and what doesn't), and when and where to improve.

Additional Success services included, such as onboarding, customer support, Help Center, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Mobile and cloud-based market research solution for businesses that helps collect, share and collaborate over research-based data.
similar_products.features: SurveyMonkey Enterprise empowers businesses to capture and act on critical feedback to drive growth and innovation at scale with advanced security and compliance features. Integrate survey feedback with your technology stack to enrich decision-making and automate workflows. SurveyMonkey's products, enterprise solutions, and integrations enable more than 335,000 organizations to deliver better customer experiences, increase employee retention, and unlock growth and innovation.

similar_products.short_desc: Uncover the hidden drivers of engagement & measure the pulse of your company culture with Leapsome?s employee engagement surveys.
similar_products.features:
With Leapsome you can run engagement surveys, pulse surveys, and collect eNPS to gather meaningful feedback and insights from employees. With the powerful survey analytics you can understand the engagement drivers that impact performance levels and employee churn so you can develop and retain your team.

Furthermore, Leapsome is an all-in-one people management platform used by CEOs and HR teams to not only drive employee engagement but also performance and learning as well.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top 360 Degree Feedback software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of 360 Degree Feedback tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: 360 Degree Feedback software is designed to help human resource departments gather all-around information about an employee. Unlike performance assessment software, 360 Degree Feedback applications allow organizations to collect information not only from superiors but also from peers and subordinates, as well as clients. The information collected can be used either for assessment or training purposes. 360 Degree Feedback software is related to Performance Appraisal software, Survey software and Human Resource software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Experience software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Experience tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Experience software (also known as CXM or CEM) helps to collect, organize and track customer feedback. This software includes a variety of applications for collecting customer opinions to tools for converting text-based feedback into numeric information that can later be used for marketing purposes. Customer Experience software is related to Survey software, Customer Satisfaction software and Customer Loyalty software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Employee Recognition software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Employee Recognition tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Employee Recognition solutions assist with keeping employees feeling engaged and appreciated at work. This software facilitates peer recognition on corporate and team discussion boards, administration of awards and loyalty programs, as well as extensive reporting and analytics. Employee Recognition software is related to HR software and Talent Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IVR software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IVR tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Interactive Voice Response (IVR) software, allows call centers, help desks and other organizations to create menus which the caller can navigate using spoken commands or their telephone keys. IVR software is mainly used for systems that allow callers to select information or enter data without the need for assistance. IVR systems can also be used to route callers to the appropriate department within an organization, based on their answers to qualifying questions.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Market Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Market Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Market Research software helps researchers effectively recruit, survey and maintain panel members and gather data. Using this software can yield consumer insight into marketing appeal, promotions effectiveness, product development, and customer service. A single interface can control all panel functions, including frequently used questions, panel invitations, questionnaire design, data gathering and export, and member database. Managers of online surveys and focus groups are common users of this type of software. Market Research software is related to Survey software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top NPS software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of NPS tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: NPS software helps organizations implement campaigns to measure net promoter scores. NPS is a customer and employee satisfaction benchmark calculated using surveys. The final score can be used to gauge loyalty to the brand or organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Polling software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Polling tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Polling software automates feedback solicitation and opinion collection, often in real time, from a wide range of audiences through means as diverse as telephones, mobile devices, and other tools.
